source.2539073e:
def plot_12_random_images():
    _, axs = plt.subplots(3, 4, figsize=(12, 12))
    axs = axs.flatten()
    for ax in axs:
        idx = np.random.randint(0, len(df.index)-1)
        img = mpimg.imread(IMG_URL+df.iloc[idx]["Image_Path"])
        ax.imshow(img)
        ax.set_xlabel(f"{df.iloc[idx]['Brand']} - {df.iloc[idx]['Model']}")
    plt.show()
source.962acbe4:
# Top 10 most availale images of brands

top_10_brand = df[["Image_Path", "Brand"]].groupby("Brand").agg(['count'])['Image_Path']['count'].sort_values(ascending=False)[:10]
fig = sns.barplot( x = top_10_brand.index, y = top_10_brand.values)
fig.set_xticklabels(labels=top_10_brand.index , rotation=45)
fig.set_ylabel("Number of Images in the Dataset")
fig.set_xlabel("Brand Name")
fig.set_title("Top 10 most availble vehicle brands");

# Top 10 most availale images of Model

top_10_model = df[["Image_Path", "Model"]].groupby("Model").agg(['count'])['Image_Path']['count'].sort_values(ascending=False)[:10]
fig = sns.barplot( x = top_10_model.index, y = top_10_model.values)
fig.set_xticklabels(labels=top_10_model.index , rotation=45)
fig.set_ylabel("Number of Images in the Dataset")
fig.set_xlabel("Model Name")
fig.set_title("Top 10 most availble models of vehicles");

# Vehicles with different fuel types
fig = sns.countplot(data= df, x="Fuel")
fig.set_ylabel("Number of Images in the Dataset")
fig.set_xlabel("Fuel Type")
fig.set_title("Number of Vehicles with different fuel types");

# Top 10 most availale images of vehcile capacities

top_10_cap = df[["Image_Path", "Capacity"]].groupby("Capacity").agg(['count'])['Image_Path']['count'].sort_values(ascending=False)[:10]
fig = sns.barplot( x = top_10_cap.index, y = top_10_cap.values)
fig.set_xticklabels(labels=top_10_cap.index , rotation=45)
fig.set_ylabel("Number of Images in the Dataset")
fig.set_xlabel("Capacity in (cc)")
fig.set_title("Top 10 most availble capacities of vehicles");

fig = sns.barplot( x = top_10_year.index, y = top_10_year.values)
